util

Class StringOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Option
      • util.StringOption

  • public final class StringOption
extends Option
    A Option allowing any type of content
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringOption

        public StringOption(OptionContainer optionContainer,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String toolTip,
            java.lang.String guiDescription,
            char shortFlag,
            java.lang.String longFlag,
            java.lang.String section,
            java.lang.String key)
        Creates a new StringOption and registers it at the OptionContainer
        Parameters:
        optionContainer -
        name - a unique identifier for this option to register at OptionContainer
        toolTip - a description for this option to use it for example as a tool-tip in any GUIs
        guiDescription - a short string usable to label this option
        shortFlag - a unique printable char to register at flags or Flag.NoShortFlag to enable this option
        longFlag - a unique printable string to register at flags or Flag.NoLongFlag to enable this option
        section - the section identifier for this option, to access by Main.getConfigValue(String, String, String) and Main.setConfigValue(String, String, String)
        key - the key identifier for this option, to access by Main.getConfigValue(String, String, String) and Main.setConfigValue(String, String, String)

      • StringOption

        public StringOption(OptionContainer optionContainer,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String toolTip,
            java.lang.String guiDescription,
            char shortFlag,
            java.lang.String longFlag,
            java.lang.String section,
            java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Creates a new StringOption and registers it at the OptionContainer
        Parameters:
        optionContainer -
        name - a unique identifier for this option to register at OptionContainer
        toolTip - a description for this option to use it for example as a tool-tip in any GUIs
        guiDescription - a short string usable to label this option
        shortFlag - a unique printable char to register at flags or Flag.NoShortFlag to enable this option
        longFlag - a unique printable string to register at flags or Flag.NoLongFlag to enable this option
        section - the section identifier for this option, to access by Main.getConfigValue(String, String, String) and Main.setConfigValue(String, String, String)
        key - the key identifier for this option, to access by Main.getConfigValue(String, String, String) and Main.setConfigValue(String, String, String)
        defaultValue - the value returned if the key does not exist in given section
